track_strategy: Extend the braking phase and recalibrate reference points for significantly reduced adhesion. Modulate throttle via short-shifting to mitigate torque-induced wheelspin and minimize slip angles through all corners. A positive track temperature delta requires monitoring for aquaplaning; a negative delta or increased precipitation necessitates an immediate pit stop for the full wet compound. If accelerated degradation is observed, the tire is outside its thermal operating window; box for a compound change.
